CONMIX RMC

Unbreakable and long lasting

Trust of Experts

  • Operating 02 RMC PLANTs in Surat, along with a leading Aggregate brand and several quarries and plants located in South Gujarat, for over 20 years.
  • Our core business at CONMIX is Ready Mix Concrete. We manufacture, design, and supply Ready Mix Concrete tailored to meet specific customer needs.
  • With a team of experienced engineers and concrete technologists, we deliver high-performance, durable concrete for various applications and requirements.
  • Equipped with a modern, computer-controlled batching plant, we have a combined capacity of approximately 18,000 cubic meters per month.
Conmix

Best ready mix concrete for

Strong construction
